Sharp Decisions has established a level of integrity, strength and passion you won’t find elsewhere. We are passionate about doing right while solving problems for some of the world’s most recognized companies by finding the best fit between people and technology. This passion drove us to create a strategic commitment to hiring veterans through our unique V.E.T.S.™ Program to combat the problem of veteran unemployment.We continue to find the right fit between people and technology for some of the world’s most recognized companies. Sharp Decisions offers immense stability for our clients, employees and veterans. Through our unique V.E.T.S. Program, we will continue to pioneer new opportunities to transform veteran quality of life. Sharp Decisions will live by its core principles of integrity, strength and passion to remain in the forefront of our industry.

Volunteers are the key to our success! The time and effort volunteers spend with the animals keeps the Arizona Animal Welfare League and SPCA (AAWL & SPCA) empowered to save the lives of homeless animals. Thank you for your interest in joining our dynamic volunteer ranks!Volunteer Requirements At least 18 years old. (If you are under 18 our Animal Tales™ Education program will provide a variety of hands-on animal experiences for kids and teens or see below for the Youth/School Projects link). Able to provide eight hours of service per month for a minimum six month period. Able to squat, bend, twist, lift, or stand for long periods when working directly with the animals. Possess strong customer service skills including writing and clear verbal communications in English as all volunteer positions work directly with the public, staff and other volunteers. For safety reasons, volunteers who wish to work directly with the animals must be  able to listen to kennel/cattery commands and verbally communicate to public, staff and volunteers. Attend the Volunteer Orientation & Shelter Training class held three times per month.

MANA House Mission Continues - 1st Platoon Phoenix

Join The Mission Continues, 1st Platoon Phoenix and our friends from Team RWB & Wounded Warrior Project as we kick off our 1st project of the year helping our fellow comrades! We will be conducting a major renovation project at MANA House. MANA House is a nonprofit transitional living facility for homeless veterans, currently housing over 55 of our nation’s heroes. Together, we will build & furnish new flooring, custom chow hall tables, picnic tables, park benches, new computer lab, music room, an outdoor memorial park area & much more. Stay from 4pm-630pm for a special Memorial Park Dedication, lots of food and a special performance from the band Tridon! We are serving together in the Honor & Memory of Chief AWSC Sean P. Sullivan, US Navy. Chief Sullivan gave his life for our country on July 19, 2012 while serving in support of Operation Enduring Freedom, when his helicopter crashed in Oman during a heavy lift operation. Chief Sullivan embodied the spirit of The Mission Continues; having coordinated & participated in a multitude of meaningful volunteer events throughout his military career. Please wear your Mission Continues, Team RWB or WWP shirt, sunscreen, closed-toed shoes & pants. Also be sure to bring safety goggles & work gloves. Morning foods, lunch and water will be provided.  Vets On Media (VoM) will be broadcasting live on site. VoM is generously donating 1 month of free ad space on their homepage ($450 value) to all businesses who donate or sponsor this event. Vets On Media is an internet radio company with over 14 network shows & over 100,000 listeners! To find out how you can donate to this event please contact SQL Luis Cardenas & PL Rachel Gutierrez. We need lots of help!

summary: For over 25 years, Sharp Decisions has been finding the best fit between people and technology for some of the world’s most recognized and respected companies. Our history of achievement and superior service means we’ve built the technology backbone for numerous public and private sector clients.Serving our clients with the right combination of people and technology is the result of long term, worldwide relationships and an unshakable commitment to putting their interests first. It is the result of doing the right thing and valuing integrity above all.http://www.sharpdecisions.com/about/
